tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE tax_credits_and_incentives (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    tax_credit_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    tax_credit_amount DECIMAL,
    tax_credit_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE tax_credits (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE incentives (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    percentage DECIMAL(5, 2),
    eligibility_criteria TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE companies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    industry VARCHAR(100),
    headquarters_location VARCHAR(255),
    established_date DATE,
    contact_email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE tax_credits (
  credit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  credit_name VARCHAR(255),
  credit_description TEXT,
  credit_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  tax_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE tax_incentives (
  incentive_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incentive_name VARCHAR(255),
  incentive_description TEXT,
  incentive_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  applicable_tax_category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE taxpayers (
  taxpayer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  taxpayer_name VARCHAR(255),
  taxpayer_address TEXT,
  taxpayer_phone VARCHAR(20),
  tax_filing_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE tax_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  taxpayer_id INT,
  tax_year INT,
  tax_type VARCHAR(50),
  tax_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE tax_credits (
  tax_credit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tax_credit_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  tax_credit_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE incentives (
  incentive_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incentive_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  incentive_description TEXT,
  eligibility_criteria TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE businesses (
  business_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  business_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  industry VARCHAR(100),
  headquarters_location VARCHAR(255),
  contact_email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE applications (
  application_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  business_id INT,
  tax_credit_id INT,
  incentive_id INT,
  application_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE contacts (
  contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  role VARCHAR(100)
)
